weapons.name: Broadsword
weapons.description: A sturdy sword that grants 3 attack dice.

weapons.name: Battle Axe
weapons.description: Massive damage with 4 attack dice; prevents use of shield.

weapons.name: Shortsword
weapons.description: A light sword that allows diagonal attacks and yields 2 attack dice.

weapons.name: Staff
weapons.description: Usable by spellcasters; grants 2 attack dice and diagonal reach.

weapons.name: Dagger
weapons.description: Small blade with 1 attack die; can be thrown once.

weapons.name: Spear
weapons.description: Long spear with diagonal reach and 2 attack dice.

armor.name: Chainmail
armor.description: Adds 1 defend die; usable by all heroes except Wizard.

armor.name: Plate Mail
armor.description: Adds 2 defend dice; slows movement; not for Wizard.

shields.name: Shield
shields.description: Adds 1 defend die; cannot be used with Battle Axe or Crossbow.

items.name: Potion of Healing
items.description: Restores up to 1d6 Body Points when consumed.

items.name: Potion of Strength
items.description: Grants +1 attack die on your next attack roll.

items.name: Potion of Defense
items.description: Grants +2 defend dice on your next defense roll.

items.name: Potion of Speed
items.description: Allows you to move twice on your turn.

items.name: Holy Water
items.description: If used instead of attacking, instantly kills one undead creature (Skeleton, Zombie, Mummy).

items.name: Heroic Brew
items.description: Drink before attacking to make two attacks instead of one (two separate attack actions).
